title: [GAMEPLAY] Nami W interaction with Sivir E
body: I was playing a casual game of league and while in bot lane I use Nami W on Sivir who used E and naturally it bounced to my ADC, but then it bounced back to Sivir a 2nd time (enemy support was not around.) This is the first time I've come across the interaction and I'm just not sure if it is an intended interaction.

replies.body: Hiya! I'm a filthy Nami main, and this is working as intended! :)
Nothing wrong with being a Nami main :) I guess it took me a few seasons to finally have the interaction.
It's an oddball one, for sure! :)
Weird, I think Sivir's Spellshield normally devours entire bounce spells.
